article_title: Police looking into Penn Hills home invasion that hospitalized man
article_text:
“There was some type of home invasion that took place. There was shots fired. And we have one victim with a very minor injury,” Wilkinson said.

No one was shot, but a shard of glass struck a man near his eye during the incident.

Officers were called to Pierce Street at 12:23 a.m. Sunday for a report of gunfire, Penn Hills police Sgt. David Wilkinson said.
